Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 75th/Stewart
ShortDescription: Eastbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via  74th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/Stewart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via  74th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/Stewart.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Stony Island
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 63rd, Lake Shore Drive, 57th & Hyde Park, due to street blockage near 63rd/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, 63rd, Lake Shore Drive, 57th & Hyde Park, due to street blockage near 63rd/Stony Island.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #15 Jeffery Local & #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Stony Island

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Addison due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Addison due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
